text:
Decent food, friendly service, they were weekend slammed when we arrived, but once we got our order in the food came very quickly. 

Noting really on the menu for vegetarians outside of breakfast though.
The food is good, I only go for the mashed potatoes for breakfast.... if you have two hours to spare waiting for coffee, food, a waitress or waiter....
A large cheap restaurant with various food on the prix fixe daily menu.
